name: Woozy Quidzy toxic island
description:
Woozy Quidzy toxic island is an ambitious shooter survival game of the futur !!!

It will teach your grandma how to suck eggs !

Good luck and have fun !

A little game made for the Trijam #118 Toxicity.

The goal was to made a game in 3h, here are our respective production time :

Guibal Adrien : 1h30 : background + UI

Prud’hom Miguel  3h : character design and animation

Liette Robin 2h : music and sound design

Banti Konrad 4h : dev on Unity
